text: The 2017 Dubai 24 Hour was the 12th running of the Dubai 24 Hour endurance race. It took place at the Dubai Autodrome in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, and ran between 11–13 January 2017. ==Race result== Class Winners in bold. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Pos !
